title: Georges Seurat A Sunday on La Grande Jatte – 1884 Matted Note Card
description:
Print developed from Georges Seurat’s A Sunday on La Grande Jatte– 1884, 1884-86, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Inspired by research in optical and color theory, he juxtaposed tiny dots of colors that, through optical blending, form a single and, Seurat believed, more brilliantly luminous hue in the viewer's eye.

  • Print Reproduction
  • Image Dimensions:  6.5 x 4.375 in.
  • Full Dimensions:  8 x 10 in.
  • Materials:  Premium cardstock.
